name: Probe Droid
Lore: 'Arakyd Viper probe droid. Has sensors specifically designed to detect traces of Rebel activity. Equipped with an auto-destruct mechanism. A highly durable spy droid.',
Text: 'Deploys only if a Star Destroyer on table. Once during each of your control phases, may peek at X cards randomly selected from opponent''s hand, where X = number of [Light Side Force] icons at same site. May Force drain, initiate battle and be battled.',
